mapper.update: update l_grain set grainid=grainid ,graincateid=#{graincateid} ,graincode=#{graincode} ,grainname=#{grainname} ,grainkind=#{grainkind} ,gbgraincode=#{gbgraincode} ,orderno=#{orderno} where grainid=#{grainid}

update l_grain set grainid=grainid ,graincateid=#{graincateid} ,graincode=#{graincode} ,grainname=#{grainname} ,grainkind=#{grainkind} ,gbgraincode=#{gbgraincode} ,orderno=#{orderno} where 1=1 and grainid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and grainid =#{Where_Id} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and graincateid=#{Where_graincateid} and graincode=#{Where_graincode} and grainname=#{Where_grainname} and grainkind=#{Where_grainkind} and gbgraincode=#{Where_gbgraincode} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.grainid "grainid", t.graincateid "graincateid", t.graincode "graincode", t.grainname "grainname", t.grainkind "grainkind", t.gbgraincode "gbgraincode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain t where grainid=#{grainid}

select t.grainid "grainid", t.graincateid "graincateid", t.graincode "graincode", t.grainname "grainname", t.grainkind "grainkind", t.gbgraincode "gbgraincode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain t where 1=1 and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.graincateid=#{graincateid} and t.graincode=#{graincode} and t.grainname=#{grainname} and t.grainkind=#{grainkind} and t.gbgraincode=#{gbgraincode} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select t.grainid "grainid", t.graincateid "graincateid", t.graincode "graincode", t.grainname "grainname", t.grainkind "grainkind", t.gbgraincode "gbgraincode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain t where 1=1 and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.graincateid=#{graincateid} and t.graincode=#{graincode} and t.grainname=#{grainname} and t.grainkind=#{grainkind} and t.gbgraincode=#{gbgraincode} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
mapper.delete: delete from l_grain where 1=1 and grainid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and grainid =#{Where_Id} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and graincateid=#{Where_graincateid} and graincode=#{Where_graincode} and grainname=#{Where_grainname} and grainkind=#{Where_grainkind} and gbgraincode=#{Where_gbgraincode} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.grainid "grainid", t.graincateid "graincateid", t.graincode "graincode", t.grainname "grainname", t.grainkind "grainkind", t.gbgraincode "gbgraincode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain t where 1=1 and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.graincateid=#{graincateid} and t.graincode=#{graincode} and t.grainname=#{grainname} and t.grainkind=#{grainkind} and t.gbgraincode=#{gbgraincode} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select count(*) from l_grain t where 1=1 and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainid!=#{NoId} and t.graincateid=#{graincateid} and t.graincode=#{graincode} and t.grainname=#{grainname} and t.grainkind=#{grainkind} and t.gbgraincode=#{gbgraincode} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
